thread.title: BREAKING: Lamar Odom Reportedly Emerges From Coma, Recognises Ex-Wife Khloe
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Lamar Odom Reportedly Emerges From Coma, Recognises Ex-Wife Khloe

author: Huffington Post
title: BREAKING: Lamar Odom Reportedly Emerges From Coma, Recognises Ex-Wife Khloe
text:
0 Lamar Odom pictured on May 11, 2011 in El Segundo, California. Lamar Odom has reportedly come out of his coma and is breathing without machine assistance, according to multiple reports. According to E! News, “ Odom opened his eyes , saw estranged wife Khloe Kardashian, said, ‘Hey, baby,’ gave her a thumbs up and then went back to sleep.” A representative for Odom’s aunt confirmed his consciousness and ability to speak , reports AP. The 35-year-old Odom was hospitalized on Tuesday after he reportedly took a number of drugs at a Nevada brothel. He had been at the brothel since the Saturday prior. Entertainment Tonight first reported the news of his improving condition on Friday morning. ESPN’s Ramona Shelburne and USA Today’s Martin Rogers have also reported the news of his improving health condition. From LV: Just received info Lamar Odom opened eyes+communicated in some form this morning. Couldn't confirm ET claim he asked to see kids. 
— Martin Rogers (@mrogersUSAT) October 16, 2015 THIS JUST IN: Lamar Odom is conscious, breathing on his own in Las Vegas hospital. (via @ramonashelburne ) pic.twitter.com/oBbIHdtZIp
